moves.9. Nd5 Nxd5 10. exd5 Bf5 11. Bd3 Bxd3 12: A couple of minors vanish for each side.
moves.12... O-O 13. O-O-O Nd7: Development is now complete, and the middle game proper begins.
moves.17... f6 18. h4 h6 19. Rhg1 Qc7 20. c3 K: White succeeds in driving my King back into the center.
moves.27. Rd5 Qc4 28. Rgd1 Rgd8 29. Qb6 Qc6 30: White secures a positional advantage. I am close to move-bound.
moves.30... b6 31. a3 a5 32. Qb5 Qxb5 33. Rxb5: Two Rooks and Pawns is the most difficult end game to play well.
moves.57. Rxc2: ...and then the other passed Q side pawn vanish.
moves.59... Rb7 60. Rxb7 Kxb7: White could now win with 61 P-K7.
moves.61. Kb5 Kc7: I hasten back towards the threat.
